TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {13958=DoD, GSA, and NASA are issuing a correction to FAR Case 2012-023; Uniform Procurement Identification (Item III), which was published in the Federal Register at 79 FR 61739, October 14, 2014., 30556=§ 2324 - Allowable costs under defense contracts, 28846=§ 2312 - Remission of liquidated damages, 31149=§ 2329 - Repealed., 48902=DoD, GSA, and NASA are proposing to amend the Federal Acquisition Regulation (FAR) to implement a section of the National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA) for Fiscal Year (FY) 2013 to include in the Federal Awardee Performance and Integrity Information System (FAPIIS), to the extent practicable, identification of any immediate owner or subsidiary, and all predecessors of an offeror that held a Federal contract or grant within the last three years. The objective is to provide a more comprehensive understanding of the performance and integrity of the corporation before awarding a Federal contract., 27627=§ 2305 - Contracts: planning, solicitation, evaluation, and award procedures, 28704=§ 2311 - Assignment and delegation of procurement functions and responsibilities, 31618=§ 2332 - Share-in-savings contracts, 27871=§ 2306 - Kinds of contracts, 29172=§ 2314 - Laws inapplicable to agencies named in section 2303 of this title, 30756=§ 2326 - Undefinitized contractual actions: restrictions, 31229=§ 2330 - Procurement of contract services: management structure, 32125=§ 2336, 28399=§ 2308 - Buy-to-budget acquisition: end items, 29881=§ 2320 - Rights in technical data, 30666=§ 2325 - Restructuring costs, 28605=§ 2310 - Determinations and decisions, 28948=§ 2313 - Examination of records of contractor, 26122=§ 2302 - Definitions, 29976=§ 2321 - Validation of proprietary data restrictions, 28310=§ 2307 - Contract financing, 29495=§ 2316 - Disclosure of identity of contractor, 30874=§ 2327 - Contracts: consideration of national security objectives, 31888=§ 2334 - Independent cost estimation and cost analysis, 32004=§ 2335 - Prohibition on collection of political information, 30170=§ 2323 - Contract goal for small disadvantaged businesses and certain institutions of higher education, 31473=§ 2331 - Procurement of services: contracts for professional and technical services, 29682=§ 2318 - Advocates for competition, 31715=§ 2333 - Joint policies on requirements definition, contingency program management, and contingency contracting, 25966=§ 2301 - Repealed. Pub. L. 103–355 , title I , § 1501(a), Oct. 13, 1994, 108 Stat. 3296 ], 28506=§ 2309 - Allocation of appropriations, 29778=§ 2319 - Encouragement of new competitors, 29602=§ 2317 - Repealed., 29308=§ 2315 - Law inapplicable to the procurement of automatic data processing equipment and services for certain defense purposes, 26848=§ 2304 - Contracts: competition requirements, 32216=§ 2337 - Life-cycle management and product support, 26671=§ 2303 - Applicability of chapter, 31001=§ 2328 - Release of technical data under Freedom of Information Act: recovery of costs, 30090=§ 2322 - Repealed., 54366=DoD, GSA, and NASA are proposing to amend the Federal Acquisition Regulation (FAR) to further implement the inflation adjustment of acquisition-related dollar thresholds. A statute requires an adjustment every five years of acquisition-related thresholds for inflation using the Consumer Price Index for all urban consumers, except for the Construction Wage Rate Requirements statute (Davis-Bacon Act), Service Contract Labor Standards statute, and trade agreements thresholds. DoD, GSA, and NASA are also proposing to use the same methodology to adjust nonstatutory FAR acquisition-related thresholds in 2015., 32957=Title 48 published on 2014-10-01}
